<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/793</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/793</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Mapes d'Espanya</string>
            <string language="en">Maps of Spain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karten von Spanien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de l'Espagne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapas de Spain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmi della Spagna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτες της Ισπανίας</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs didàctic interactiu que permet representar i imprimir dades estadístiques diverses  (geogràfiques,  econòmiques i demogràfiques) sobre mapes d'Espanya, així com la creació de gràfics. Els mapes poden modificar la seva escala</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource that allows viewer to present and print different types of statistics (geographic, economic and demographic) on maps of Spain, and also to draw graphs. The map scale can be modified.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cartografia</string>
            <string language="en">cartography</string>
            <string language="es">cartografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">desenvolupament econòmic</string>
            <string language="en">economic development</string>
            <string language="es">desarrollo económico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">recursos econòmics</string>
            <string language="en">economic resources</string>
            <string language="es">recursos económicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geografia</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
            <string language="es">geografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">migració</string>
            <string language="en">migration</string>
            <string language="es">migración</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">població</string>
            <string language="en">population</string>
            <string language="es">población</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">estadística</string>
            <string language="en">statistics</string>
            <string language="es">estadística</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel, das Projektor erlaubt, 
unterschiedliche Typen der Statistiken (geographisch, ökonomisch und 
demographisch) auf Karten von Spanien darzustellen und zu drucken und 
Diagramme auch zeichnen. Die Karte Skala kann geändert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive qui permet au visualisateur 
de présenter et imprimer différents types de statistiques 
(géographique, économique et démographique) sur des cartes de 
l'Espagne, et tracer également des graphiques. L'échelle de 
carte peut être modifiée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo que permite que o visor 
apresente e imprima tipos diferentes de statistics (geográfico, 
econômico e demográfico) em mapas de Spain, e para desenhar também 
gráficos. A escala do mapa pode ser modificada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva che permette che il visore 
presenti e stampi i tipi differenti di statistiche (geografico, 
economico e demografico) sui programmi della Spagna ed anche tracciare
i grafici. La scala del programma può essere modificata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς που επιτρέπει στην 
εμφάνιση για να παρουσιάσει και να τυπώσει τους διαφορετικούς 
τύπους στατιστικών (γεωγραφικός, οικονομικός και δημογραφικός) 
στους χάρτες της Ισπανίας, και επίσης για να σύρει τις γραφικές 
παραστάσεις. Η κλίμακα χαρτών μπορεί να τροποποιηθεί.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cartography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ökonomische Entwicklung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ökonomische Betriebsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
